file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 55-36-04-08 - EPOXY-CERAMIC-COATING MARKS ON THE TAIL BOOM AND HORIZONTAL STABILIZER - REPAIR

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EPOXY-CERAMIC-COATING MARKS ON THE TAIL BOOM AND HORIZONTAL STABILIZER - REPAIR EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to repair the epoxy ceramic coating marks on the front fairing and horizontal-stabilizer leading-edge root fairings. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY CERAMIC COATING MARKS ON THE ALL 55-36-04-300-801-A TAIL BOOM FRONT FAIRING - PAINTING REPAIR EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 55-36-04 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 55-36-04-300-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. CERAMIC COATING MARKS ON THE TAIL BOOM FRONT FAIRING - PAINTING REPAIR A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to repair the epoxy ceramic coating marks on the front fairing and horizontal-stabilizer leading-edge root fairings. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER LEADING-EDGE ROOT- AMM TASK 55-15-01-000-801-A/400 FAIRING POLYURETHANE FILM -REMOVAL HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER LEADING-EDGE ROOT- AMM TASK 55-15-01-400-801-A/400 FAIRING POLYURETHANE FILM -INSTALLATION CPM 51-21-11 - IPC 55-36-00 TAIL BOOM C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 321 Horizontal stabilizer 333 Horizontal stabilizer 334 Horizontal stabilizer D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the work area available Commercially Acrylic spatula To remove/install polyurethane film available E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Protective Gloves For protection of technician's hands 1 available Commercially Safety Goggles For protection of technician's eyes 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable EMB-145 - AMM 1285 300-801-A/800 55-36-04 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) Polyurethane Film IPC 55-36-00 AR H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Outside the aircraft I. Epoxy Ceramic Coating - Application SUBTASK 110-002-A (1) Remove the Polyurethane Film from the Horizontal-Stabilizer Leading-Edge Root- Fairing (AMM TASK 55-15-01-000-801-A/400), if applicable. (2) Apply the epoxy ceramic coating as shown in Figure 801. Refer to CPM 51-21-11. NOTE: Make sure that the final thickness of the epoxy ceramic coating is between 0.13 to 0.20 mm (0.005 to 0.009 in) (3) Install the Polyurethane Film on the Horizontal-Stabilizer Leading-Edge Root-Fairing (AMM TASK 55-15-01-400-801-A/400), if applicable. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 300-801-A/800 55-36-04 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
